name: Railroad ties, hardwood, creosote treated, SE
description: Pressure-treated creosote southeast US hardwood rail road ties. Base process data presented with allocations to within process co-products noted.  Refer to allocation worksheet for specifics.  All allocations performed using mass or volume. This sheet sets out each unit process in the production of one cubic meter of creosote treated rail road ties producted in the Southeast region.  Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has  undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet  undergone a formal validation process. Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.; Geography: SE US

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
